Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory560.png'}
{3: 'Swish swish... swish swish...'}
{3: 'Focus, hold your breath, and shake the maracas to the rhythm of the music.'}
{3: 'Swish swish... swish swish...'}
{3: 'In front of you, Sophia is dancing to the rhythm of the maracas.'}
{3: 'The girl is in an elegant coating, her body and face adorned with decorations. She moves gracefully to the music, each movement apparently telling a story from long ago.'}
{3: 'At first, you have to consciously follow the music to keep up, but slowly, your hands start moving naturally with the dance.'}
{3: '...And before you know it, the dance has ended.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Thank you, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'So how did I do? Out of 100?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "C'mon, I'm sure I didn't do that well.", 4: '1'}
{2: "I'm sure people would die fighting over tickets to your performance if you ever had one.", 3: '17'}
{3: 'You got a message from ACA today not only wishing you a happy birthday, but also inviting you to a celebration.'}
{3: 'So you hop on a transport craft that took you to the Asslam. You attend the celebration briefly before following Sophia to her room.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory514.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: "Commandant, I've prepared some performances and services for you... for free, of course, since it's your birthday today.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Sophia's dance just now was part of the program."}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Uhm... well, I guess that means I could make the tickets very expensive, then.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'And you could help me sell them. We could split the earnings 30-70.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "But that would I'd have to learn to dance to a different song.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Why is that? You could just go with the one you danced to just now, no?', 3: '26'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "That one just now was meant for you, Commandant. It's a limited edition.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "If you want to see it on any other day, you'd have to pay 100000 Black Cards.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Well, that means I got lucky today, no?'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Would you like to see it again?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Of course... but I guess I was swinging the maracas a bit too hard just now...', 3: '31'}
{2: 'My shoulders are a bit sore. Maybe we should wait a bit?', 3: '32'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "Ohh, uhm. Well, let's see...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "Come and lie down here, Commandant. I'll give you a massage with my mechanical arms. It's part of the birthday service and it's free.", 4: '1'}

{3: "Following Sophia's instructions, you lie down. Soon, the mechanical arms start massaging your shoulders and arms. The pressure is just right, and the accuracy is remarkable. You feel incredibly relaxed."}
{3: 'As you relax, you feel two small hands pressing on your face.'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Your head is heavy with thoughts and you frown all the time, Commandant, which is not good.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Here, let me help your facial muscles relax.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Small and warm, Sophia's hands move back and forth on your face. It feels great."}
{2: 'Say, where did you pick much knowledge about the human body...', 3: '40'}
{2: "When you've always been in the maintenance unit?", 3: '41'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "I am Jamilah's guard, and I have to... well, engage in fights sometimes.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'So, I have to know which parts of the body do what and where to strike to kill or injure my enemies.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Jamilah told me everything, and I internalized them through actual fights.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Hey, I think your body just tensed up again, no?', 4: '1'}
{3: '...Should have just stayed quiet.'}
{3: "Soon, your body feels relaxed again with Sophia's massage."}
{3: 'Shaking your neck, you notice Sophia has placed a small gift box before you.'}
{2: "Uhm? What's this?"}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "A little something I've got you for your birthday, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Are you familiar with the 12 zodiac signs?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I know a few things about it...', 3: '52', 4: 'Never heard of it.', 5: '52'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "It's something from the Golden Age. It's got to do with the stars, where everyone has a sign based on their birth date.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Sophia opens the gift box, revealing a delicate item made from what appears to be a precious mineral.'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "I got this from a merchant. I don't know much about zodiac signs, but I thought you just might be interested in them.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "This one here is incomplete, though, because it only has seven of them, and it's missing your sign...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "But I'll keep an eye out for the other five and try to get all of them for you.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Don't worry. These are plenty enough already.", 3: '58', 4: 'Thank you so much, Sophia.', 5: '57'}

{2: 'Sophia', 3: "Don't mention it... Everything I'm doing today is free since it's your birthday today, Commandant, but looking for the missing signs is a future task and you'll have to pay for that.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "And as far as the missing five signs go, I'll need ten thousand Black Cards for each of them, and thirty thousand for the one that's your sign.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Oh, that's...", 3: '61', 4: "Cheaper than I thought. Are you sure you didn't mind 100 thousand and 300 thousand?", 5: '61'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "Actually, there's another way for you to pay.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Jamilah told me that time is money. You can pay me by spending time with me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "I'm fine either way.", 4: '1'}
